description:
The leader of a separate group of boys sold to CGS as "human debris", he`s cold, withdrawn, and cliquish. Often takes on risky front-line missions. His piloting skills are second only to Mikazuki`s.
2nd season:Captain of Tekkadan`s Second Working Unit. He has a well-trained body, and specializes in tasks such as defensive combat and long-duration mobile suit operation.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Akihiro Altland
